overview: Compilation of two Fox Studio short films. In School Daze, Tom LeDuc is a college jock who conveniently seduces a fellow student, Rob Schott, and brings him home to his off-campus dormâ€¦ only to be spied on, and lusted after, by his horny stud roommate (super hung Scott Pryer). In All American Muscle, competition body builder Dave Henderson showers up and then masturbates. In the 1989 reissue, a third scene was added, bringing the running time to 74 minutes.
title: School Daze
